resources.string: San Antonio
To Do
Eats
Parks
Hotels
"The Alamo Mission"
Small, shrine-like fortress & monument to Texas history with a museum, artifacts, gardens & more.
300 Alamo Plaza, San Antonio, TX 78205
Tower of the Americas
The Tower of the Americas is a 750-foot observation tower-restaurant located in the Hemisfair district on the southeastern portion of Downtown San Antonio, Texas.
739 E César E. Chávez Blvd, San Antonio, TX 78205
San Antonio River Walk
Iconic area with landscaped walkways, bridges, restaurants, bars, hotels, shops & boat tours.
849 E Commerce St, San Antonio, TX 78205
SeaWorld San Antonio
Marine life shows, thrill rides, aquariums & up-close encounters with dolphins, penguins & more.
10500 Sea World Dr, San Antonio, TX 78251
Six Flags Fiesta Texas
Part of an amusement park chain with roller coasters, rides, live shows, a water park, food & beer.
17000 IH-10 West, San Antonio, TX 78257
Natural Bridge Caverns
Popular spot with subterranean cavern tours & an elevated adventure course, plus a cafe & gift shop.
26495 Natural Bridge Caverns Rd, San Antonio, TX 78266
San Antonio Zoo
Sprawling zoo with 750 species (from alligators to zebras), cageless habitats, exhibits & a train.
3903 N St Mary\'s St, San Antonio, TX 78212
Witte Museum
Touring & long-term exhibits about natural history, art and Texas heritage, plus a Science Treehouse.
3801 Broadway St, San Antonio, TX 78209
La Villita
Square-block enclave of art galleries & shops on the National Registry of Historic Districts.
418 Villita St #9, San Antonio, TX 78205
Cathedral of San Fernando
Historic 1738 church once occupied by General Santa Ana & the site of hero Jim Bowie\'s wedding.
115 Main Plaza, San Antonio, TX 78205
Rosario\'s
Lively local chain serving classic & creative Mexican dishes, plus cocktails, in a trendy setting.
910 S Alamo St, San Antonio, TX 78205
The Palm San Antonio
Storied chain serving high-end steakhouse fare, seafood & diverse wines in clubby surrounds.
233 E Houston St, San Antonio, TX 78205
Bella On the River
Intimate destination featuring Mediterranean fare, steaks, wine & outdoor dining in comfy digs.
106 River Walk St, San Antonio, TX 78205
Chart House
High-end chain eatery serving seafood & steakhouse fare in a classy setting with view.
739 E César E. Chávez Blvd, San Antonio, TX 78205
Silo Restaurant
Elevated bistro with inspired New American fare, wine & brunch, plus a bar scene on the lower level.
1133 Austin Hwy, San Antonio, TX 78209
Tycoon Flats Restaurant
Kid-friendly burger joint & beer garden with Tex-Mex grub, a full bar, craft brews & live music.
2926 N St Mary\'s St, San Antonio, TX 78212
Brackenridge Park
Brackenridge Park is a 343-acre public park in San Antonio, Texas, USA, on the city\'s Broadway Corridor just north of downtown San Antonio
3700 N St Mary\'s St, San Antonio, TX 78212
O. P. Schnabel Park
O. P. Schnabel Park is a 202-acre city park in the City of San Antonio, Texas. The park includes buildings for the YMCA program, ball fields, a basketball court, & several trails
9606 Bandera Rd, San Antonio, TX 78250
Denman Estate Park
Tree-covered park known for its authentic Korean pavilion plus a walking trail & pond.
7735 Mockingbird Ln, San Antonio, TX 78229
Mission County Park
Park offering trails along the river, a playground, performance pavilions & sports fields.
6030 Padre Dr, San Antonio, TX 78214
South Side Lions Park East
A 600-acre recreation area with a community center, a lake, a seasonal pool, sports fields & trails.
4600 Pecan Valley Dr, San Antonio, TX 78223
Lady Bird Johnson Park
77-acres with a softball complex, basketball court & a skate park plus a seasonal outdoor pool.
10700 Nacogdoches Rd, San Antonio, TX 78217
Wyndham San Antonio Riverwalk
High-rise lodging with a rooftop pool & a hot tub, plus a refined bar/grill.
111 E Pecan St, San Antonio, TX 78205
Marriott Plaza San Antonio
Upscale hotel with contemporary dining, plus tropical gardens, an outdoor pool & a fitness center.
555 S Alamo St, San Antonio, TX 78205
The Westin Riverwalk, San Antonio
Refined hotel on the River Walk, plus an Italian restaurant, a cafe, a spa & an outdoor pool.
420 W Market St, San Antonio, TX 78205
Hyatt Place San Antonio/Riverwalk
Urban rooms with 42-inch flat-screens & minifridges, plus an outdoor pool, a restaurant & a bar.
601 S St Mary\'s St, San Antonio, TX 78205
Drury Plaza Hotel San Antonio Riverwalk
Classic lodging with free WiFi, breakfast & an evening happy hour, plus 2 pools & a fitness center.
105 S St Mary\'s St, San Antonio, TX 78205
Hotel Indigo San Antonio-Riverwalk
Modern rooms & suites, some with water views, plus an outdoor pool, a restaurant & a serene terrace.
830 N St Mary\'s St, San Antonio, TX 78205
